version_description:
In this version:

• Performance and stability improvements

Happy gaming!

Hello!
In this update:
• A new holiday story for all players level 9 and above
• Special spring decorations
• A balloon race - new competitions during the festival
• The game's stability in townships has been improved
And much more! Head to our groups for more information.
Have fun!

Guys, in this update:

• A new character: the inventor Lucas, whose story starts at level 23
• The new stories ""Women's Things"" and ""Winners Can't Be Losers"" at levels 24 and 25
• New Northern Lights style furniture

Township updates:
• Awards for Townships for winning a balloon race
• The Treasure Trove is a new building for storing your awards
• The Township Leader can now distribute prizes among the residents

Find out more in groups.
Happy gaming!

Hello!
My Café just turned one!
This birthday update features:

• A new birthday story for players of level 8 or above
• Special decorations and hats
• Surprises from every coffee shop customer!

New in Townships:
• Advanced Township search
• Creating and editing Townships has become more intuitive

For more information, go to our groups.
Thanks for playing!

version_name: von Mein Café heruntergeladen haben!                                                                                                                                                                                Version 2017.7.1

version_description:
NEW EVENT
Meet a new character, Diego the traveler.
Two weeks of adventures for players level 9 and above! Complete the quests on time and get a prize!

IN THIS UPDATE:
● A new character: the charming lawyer Olivia at level 24 with the story ""Case #38""
● My Cafe is now available in Korean

LEAGUES:
● The rules for moving from league to league have been changed. It's now easier to get into the Milk and Lemon Leagues.

Thanks for downloading the latest version of My Cafe!
Performance and stability improvements

IN THIS UPDATE:
• New story at level 27: "Pre-Wedding Panic"
• New Chinese-style furniture at level 19 and above

VIP3+ UPDATES:
• Players with a VIP level of 3+ can now open presents in any order

TOWNSHIP UPDATES:
• You can now decline quests you have accepted during festivals
• The mayor can now invite players who have already been expelled from township
• Township chat has been improved

Start your restaurant adventure with My Cafe!

IN THIS UPDATE:

• The new story "Bachelor Party" on Level 27
• New Northern Lights style furniture has been added. It is available starting at Level 23

Start your restaurant adventure with My Cafe!
Performance and stability improvements

CELEBRATE HALLOWEEN WITH MY CAFE!

IN THIS HOLIDAY UPDATE:
● Holiday event: Diego the traveler has some surprising gifts for you. Two weeks of adventure for players of level 8 and above.
● Holiday decorations and furniture for Halloween
● Indonesian language support added
● The interface has been improved

NEW TO TOWNSHIPS:
● You can now have up to 20 residents in a Township
● The township leader can now have a deputy

Hello!
In this update:

• A new story at level 25: ""Chronicle of a Certain Madness""
• New Loft furniture starting at level 24
• The store interface has been improved
• Searching for active Townships has been improved

Check our social network groups for more info.
Have fun!
Performance and stability improvements

The holiday season has come to My Cafe!

Starting on December 15th you can meet a new character Nicole - she's got a magical story and a new Candy Cane Display Case for holiday recipes.
Two weeks of adventure for players of level 8 and above.
Complete the quests on time and get gifts!

Also in the update:
• The "Invite a Friend" special event
• Messages containing gifts cannot be deleted without confirmation
• The game has been optimized for iPhone X

You can read more about the update in our groups on socials.

Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!

The holiday season has come to My Cafe!

Starting on December 15th you can meet a new character Nicole - she's got a magical story and a new Candy Cane Display Case for holiday recipes.
Two weeks of adventure for players of level 8 and above.
Complete the quests on time and get gifts!

Also in the update:
• The "Invite a Friend" special event
• Messages containing gifts cannot be deleted without confirmation
• The game has been optimized for iPhone X

You can read more about the update in our groups on socials.

Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!

NEW FEATURES
• Rubies are a special in-game currency used to level up your Township. They become available at level 8.
• You can now personalize the coffee shop in your township in your favorite style.
• Every time you level up your coffee shop it will give you more new festival quests!

UPGRADES:
• Gifts have been improved. When you open a gift you get all the prizes listed in its description.

You can read more about the update in our social network groups.
Have fun!

HOLIDAY EVENT (February 5th):
• Special gifts in the style of Valentine's Day and Chinese New Year!
• Exciting quests from Diego the traveler for all players of level 7 and above!
• A new character: Comet
• A holiday ingredient: Fortune Cookies
Event duration: 2 weeks

NEW LANGUAGE ADDED: Japanese

You can learn more about the update in our social network groups.
Have fun!

IN THIS UPDATE:
• A new character, Mike, and the story "The Corporation" at level 28
• A new story, "Fashion and Jackhammers," at level 28
• New furniture added at level 25 and above

Completing both stories allows players to reach level 29 and unlock new content.

FOR VIPs:
• Customers indicate the remaining number of attempts when ordering another special recipe

HOLIDAY EVENT:
• Special gifts in the style of Valentine's Day and Chinese New Year!
• Exciting quests from Diego the traveler for all players of level 7 and above!
• A new character: Comet
• A holiday ingredient: Fortune Cookies
Event duration: 2 weeks

NEW LANGUAGE ADDED: Japanese

You can learn more about the update in our social network groups.
Have fun!
Performance and stability improvements

IN THIS UPDATE:
• A new character, Mike, and the story "The Corporation" at level 28
• A new story, "Fashion and Jackhammers," at level 28
• New furniture added at level 25 and above

Completing both stories allows players to reach level 29 and unlock new content.

FOR VIPs:
• Customers indicate the remaining number of attempts when ordering another special recipe

Hello!
Cherry Blossom Season is beginning for players of level 8 and above
• A magical Japanese cherry tree will appear next to the coffee shop that can give you diamonds!
• Earn trophies over the course of several festivals to collect more diamonds from the magical tree
• Important: only trophies that you earn personally will count

You can read more about the update in our social media groups.

Have fun!

In this update:
• Players of level 9 and above can now decorate the outside of the coffee shop!
• Choose outdoor items to suit your taste:

- Street lanterns
- Decorative fences
- Cozy benches
- Eye-catching signboards

You can read more about the update in our social media groups.

Have fun!

Let's celebrate My Café's birthday together!

Meet an unusual character with a holiday story.
Two weeks of fun and adventures for players of level 7 and above.
Complete the tasks in time to get all the gifts!

Also in the update:
• Township search improved. Townships whose leaders speak the same language as you
now appear at the top of the list

You can read more about the update in our social media groups.

Have fun!

Let's celebrate My Café's birthday together!

Meet an unusual character with a holiday story.
Two weeks of fun and adventures for players of level 7 and above.
Complete the tasks in time to get all the gifts!

Also in the update:
• Township search improved. Townships whose leaders speak the same language as you
now appear at the top of the list

You can read more about the update in our social media groups.

Have fun!

Enjoy the Fountain Season and a 90s party!

For players of level 7 and above:
• Spend two weeks with Diego the traveler and his friends
• Participate in Fountain Season! Earn trophies in festivals, and a fountain will bring you more diamonds!
Important! Only trophies you earn personally will count
• Thai version of the game is now available
• A township's founding date is now displayed in its profile

You can read more in our social network groups. Have fun!

In this update:
• A new story for level 29: "Secrets of advertising". And level up to 30!
• A new Blender device that makes milkshakes is available at level 30
• New features for VIP players

You can read more about the update in our social media groups. Have fun!

Adventure at Sea has come to My Café!
For players of level 7 and above:
• A new event: "The Mystery of Nicole's Blank Letter" (already available)
• Treasure Season is here! Earn diamonds for festival trophies

Important! Only trophies you earn yourself will count!

Also in the update:
• Move spices to the Township's Treasury right from your Spice Box
• Diamonds for changing your nickname for the first time
• Festival quests have been improved

You can read more in our social network groups.

Unforgettable Coffee Fest with a new character: Max!

For players of level 7 and above:
• Two weeks of exciting adventures with Max and Chloe!
• Play through the story and get special decorations
• Participate in Coffee Season! Earn trophies at festivals, and the Coffee Tree will give you more diamonds.
Important! Only trophies you earn yourself count.

You can read more in our social network groups. Have fun!

Celebrate the Holidays with My Cafe!
New update: 5-festival marathon
• All kinds of prizes for festival marathon participants and winners
• Special offers with huge discounts and holiday decorations
Also in the update:
For players level 8+:
• "Holiday Adventure" event with new rewards
• Candy Season!
For players level 37:
• New stories to reach level 38
• Matcha Tea device on level 38 with new recipes

For players level 8+:
• A new event story "Treasure Hunt" with riddles, unique decorations, costumes, and gifts
• A new customer: Laura the archaeologist!
• Magic Season - more diamonds from the Crystal Pyramid!

New board game levels with Lucky the Bunny (level 9+ required).

For players level 34:
• Two new stories that will get you to level 35
• Supercupcake Display Case and new recipes on level 35

In this update:
A board game for all players of level 9 and above!
New characters: Liam and Lucky the Bunny! Roll the dice and win prizes!

For players of level 8 and above:
• Two weeks of adventure with the story "Nicole in Wonderland!"
• Special decorations, costumes, and gifts
• Coffee Season!
Important! Earn trophies in festivals, and the Coffee Tree will give you more diamonds. Only trophies you earn yourself count.

You can read more in our social network groups. Have fun!

For level 8+ players:
• Investigate the flood with Diego.
• A new story with special decorations, costumes, and gifts.
• Flower Season!

Also in this update:
• Edible Gold, a new elite spice that earns the most coins.
• Extra special order with gold in a chain of orders will give you a ticket.
• Setting best price in a single tap.

For level 33-34 players:
• Two new stories at level 33 that will get you to level 34.
• New machines and recipes.

For players of level 8 and above:
• A spring event story — "The Book of Mysteries"
• A new character: Charlotte
• Special decorations, costumes, and gifts
• Cherry Blossom Season

Also in the update:
• A new story, "Happily Ever After," that will get you to level 32
• All spices in the recipe now count when you complete festival quests!

Added:
• Four cafe expansions
• Pancake griddle

You can read more about the update in our social media groups. Have fun!

For players of level 8 and above:
• A Brazilian Carnival with Chloe and Max! Get unique decorations, costumes, and gifts before time runs out
• Coconut Season is here! Earn trophies at festivals, and the Palm Tree will give you more diamonds
Important! Only trophies you earn yourself will count

You can read more about the update in our social media groups. Have fun!

Halloween is coming to My Cafe!

For players of level 7 and above:
• Try to solve the mystery of the cursed painting in 2 weeks
• Play through the story and get special Halloween decorations
• Participate in Ghost Season! Earn trophies at festivals, and the Mystical Organ will bring you more diamonds.
Important! Only trophies you earn yourself count.

You can read more in our social network groups. Have fun!

In this update:

• A new story at level 30: "The Mysterious Book"
• Polish and Turkish support added

New Township features:
• Obtain Elite Resident status and increase your Township's prestige!
• The higher a Township's prestige, the more bonuses its residents receive.

An Elite Resident can:
• Work on two festival quests at the same time
• Receive VIP points on a regular basis

Bonuses for residents of prestige Townships:
• You can see how many quests your competitors are working on
• You can ask customers for a different special recipe 5-100 times

In this update:

• A new story at level 30: "The Mysterious Book"
• Polish and Turkish support added

• Obtain Elite Resident status and increase your Township's prestige!
• The higher a Township's prestige, the more bonuses its residents receive.

An Elite Resident can:

• You can ask customers for a different special recipe 5-100 times

The holidays have come to My Cafe!

For players of level 7 and above:
• Adventures with a new character: Andy. Get special decorations and gifts
• Take part in the Holiday Season! Earn trophies in festivals, and the Christmas Tree will bring you more diamonds!
Important: only trophies you earn personally will count

Also in the update:
• A new story at level 30 that will get you to level 31: "Skeleton in the Closet"
• A Maple Syrup Machine at level 31
• New furniture

Happy holidays!

Hello! In this update:

Personal quests
• During the festival, every player will have quests that only they can accept

New roles
• Manager: can adjust the township's settings, invite new members or kick them out, and accept/decline requests to join the township
• Recruiter: can invite players to join the township and accept/decline requests to join

Managers and Recruiters are appointed by the township leader from among the residents

Learn more in our social media groups. Have fun!

New event story:
• Help Nicole find her lost dog - two weeks of adventures for players of level 7 and above
• Special decorations and gifts for completing event quests

Also in the update:
• A detective story at level 31
• New furniture in the Chinese, English, and Loft styles at level 31
You can read more in our social media groups. Have fun!

For players of level 8 and above:
• A Brazilian Carnival with Chloe and Max! Get unique decorations, costumes, and gifts before time runs out
• Coconut Season is here! Earn trophies at festivals, and the Palm Tree will give you more diamonds
Important! Only trophies you earn yourself will count

You can read more about the update in our social media groups. Have fun!

In this update:

For players level 8+:
• Enjoy the music of tango with Diego and Comet. Plus get ready for special decorations, costumes, and gifts!
• Coffee Season! Earn trophies in festivals, and the Coffee Tree will give you more diamonds
Important! Only trophies you earn personally will count

For players level 35:
• "The Damned Mirror" and "Time Machine" stories to boost you to level 36
• Canelé Display Case and new recipes at level 36

Check out our social media for more info. Have fun!

British Journey Begins!
For players level 8+:
• Charlotte's inheritance and the mystery of the ancient castle!
• Special decorations, costumes, and gifts in British style
• Ferris Wheel Season!
For players level 36:
• "Recipe for Success" and "The Universe of Our Love" stories to boost you to level 37
• Turkish Coffee Stovetop with new recipes available at level 37
• Czech language added for levels 1-15
Check out our social media for more info. Have fun!

Get ready for Halloween in My Cafe!
For players level 8+:
• Diego the traveler comes to town for a hot air balloon regatta
• Special Halloween decorations, costumes and gifts
• Potion Season!
Earn trophies at festivals, and the Magic Cauldron will bring you even more diamonds
Also in this update:
• New Chinese-style furniture on levels 34-36
Follow us on social media to read more. Have fun!

New Barista Challenge in your coffee shop!
For players level 13+.
All the coins you earn from orders without help from your employees get you closer to 1st place on the leaderboard. The higher you are, the cooler the prizes!
For players level 7+:
Coffee Season — diamonds for festival trophies!

Attention! Only trophies you earn yourself count.

Read more on our social media. Have fun!

• "Crime and Punishment" and "Knight's Tour" stories to boost you to level 39
Read more on our social media.
Have fun!

Festival Marathon!
Marathon prizes are available for both townships and PLAYERS
Also in the update:
• Now you can accept festival tasks directly in your coffee shop
• Cool new dice for the Bunny game and Purple Gifts
• New coffee shop exterior design
For players level 8+:
• Get ready for a head-spinning adventure with Diego and his mysterious friend
• Flower Season! Earn trophies in festivals and Magical Flowers will bring you more diamonds
Important! Only trophies you earn yourself count

Marathon prizes are available for both townships and PLAYERS

• Flower Season! Earn trophies in festivals and Magical Flowers will bring you more diamonds
Important! Only trophies you earn yourself count

My Cafe's birthday!
For players level 8+:
• Step back into your childhood with Chloe, Ann and Max. Get ready for gifts and lots of other fun stuff!
• Join Fountain Season! Earn trophies in festivals and the Fountain will give you more diamonds
Important! Only trophies you earn yourself count
For players level 39+:
• Two stories: "Home smart home" and "I Love You, Сoffee Shop" to reach level 40
• Waffle Maker device on level 39 with new recipes
• Moka Pot device on level 40 with new recipes

Join the Festival Marathon!
Marathon rewards go to both townships and the PLAYER
For players level 8+:
• Help Laura and her wily partner on an awesome adventure
• It's Coffee Season! Win festival trophies and the Coffee Tree will bring you even more diamonds
Important: only trophies you earn personally will count
For players level 40+:
• Meet Michaela, your new customer
• New stories to reach level 41: "Upside Down" and "Agent Double-O-Ben"
• Apple Pie Display Case on level 41 with new recipes

Hey everyone! In this update:

For players level 8+:
• Magic and revenge, courage and honor, palaces and a jousting tournament! Help Charlotte complete challenges and find out who her true friends are
• Participate in the Sun Season! Earn trophies at festivals and the Sunflower will bring you even more diamonds
Important! Only trophies you earn yourself count

Read more on our social media. Have fun!

Join the Festival Marathon!
Marathon rewards go to both townships and PLAYERS
For players level 8+:
• Two weeks of movie adventures with Nicole and unique furniture/gifts!
• Music Season! Win trophies and the Drum will bring you even more diamonds
Important: only trophies that you earn personally will count
For players level 42+:
• Trifle Display Case with new recipes
Check out our social media for more. Have fun!

Woohoo! There's a new game mode available in your coffee shop!

For players level 8+:
• Head over to Comet's and help her find the romantic surprise Diego prepared for her!
• Explore new places, solve puzzles and complete challenges
• Earn candy and exchange it for decorations in the Unique Item store!

Check out our social media for more details. Have fun!

In this update:

For players level 8+:
• Help Max trudge through virtual jungles and get cool new decorations and gifts!
• Coconut Season! Earn trophies in festivals, and the Coconut Tree will bring you more diamonds
Remember! Only trophies you earn yourself count

For level 41 players:
• "Nanny-Technology" and "A Dress or Your Life?" stories to reach level 42

Devices with new recipes:
• Lemonade on level 26
• Cherry on level 27
• Punch on level 28
• Orange on level 29
• Smoothie on level 43

Hello! In this update:
For players of level 8+:
• Strange events at the Coffee Gleam hotel!
Take on an intriguing case with Watson! Get donuts and exchange them at the Unique Items store!
• A pair of inseparable dalmatian pals, a grumpy cat, and a very long dachshund all need new owners! Help Nicole find homes for shelter animals
• Participate in Coffee Season! Earn trophies in festivals, and the Coffee Tree will give you more diamonds
Important! Only trophies you earn yourself count

Ooooh! Halloween in My Café!
For players of level 8+:
• Can Petrovich get through the wizard's lair and break the terrifying curse?
• Diego's latest adventure begins in the cemetery! Will you be brave enough to uncover the secret of the Lady of the Sea?
• Spooky Tree Season! Earn trophies in festivals and the Spooky Tree will give you more diamonds
Only trophies you earn yourself count
For level 42 players:
• Enjoy the "Brides at War" and "Total Amnesia" stories and progress to level 43

For level 42 players:
• Enjoy the "Brides at War" and "Total Amnesia" stories and progress to level 43

Psst, everybody!
Do you want to sell a recipe with any spices to a customer? Maybe you're tired of manually recharging machines and you wish the coffee shop earned bigger profits?
Boosters will help you in these and other situations. Win them in the Bunny Game, get them when you reach a new level, or look for them in special offers and gifts.
You can read more in our social network groups. Have fun!

Hello! In this update:
For players of level 8+:
• You've never had a trip to a museum like this before! Forged artworks, bona fide criminals, and Laura the archeologist who's trying to save her friend. Exchange candies for decorations in the store!
• A pajama party in an ancient castle—what could go wrong? Find out in the new adventure with Charlotte!
• Disco Season! Earn trophies in festivals, and the Disco Speaker will give you more diamonds
Important! Only trophies you earn yourself count

Christmas miracles and a Festival Marathon!

• Customers say 2020 hasn't been the best year. But Diego is going to change that! Play the story and get gifts

Important! Only trophies you earn yourself count
Merry Christmas and happy New Year!
